column9: Brazilian dairy breed created by crossing Gir and Holstein (3/8 Gir, 5/8 Holstein)
Hardy beef breed from Russia and Kazakhstan.
Local Romanian milk breed, the result of crossbreeding between Braunvieh and local Mocanita and Grey cattle.
Israeli sheep breed that is a product of crossbreeding Awassi and East Friesian; dual purpose milk and meat breed with white wool
One of the main sheep breeds in Egypt, well-adapted to the desert environment.
Hardy French breed characterized by brownish-black wool, prolificacy, and good milk production.
